scripts.licenses: npm run licenses-landing && npm run licenses-app
scripts.buildTest: npm run build-app && npm run testdist
scripts.pull-main: cd anita-app.github.io && git pull --force origin main
scripts.push-to-origin: cd anita-app.github.io && git push -u origin main
scripts.publish-to-github-pages: npm run add-all && npm run commit-with-message && npm run push-to-origin
scripts.deploy: npm run pull-main && npm run licenses && cglg --action=newRelease && npm run do-no-run-this-deploy-directly && cglg --action=closeRelease && npm run publish-to-github-pages
scripts.do-no-run-this-deploy-directly: npm run propagate-version && npm run build-landing && npm run build-app
